media:group.media:title: Azerbaijan threatens to use its โfull arsenalโ against Armenia in self-defense
media:group.media:description:
๐ Azerbaijan has accused Armenia of using heavy weaponry against it, and threatened to take large-scale military action in response. Armenia denies the claim and reiterated its call for a joint mechanism to investigate such allegations. ๐ Iran joined Armenia in denying an unsourced article claiming they signed a large weapons deal. ๐ CivilNet Podcast with Hovsep Patvakanyan from the Investment Council of Armenia: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s3gkmdAoOT0 ๐ Why was Euronews at Aliyevโs Media Forum in Shushi?: https://www.civilnet.am/en/news/790203/why-was-euronews-at-aliyevs-media-forum-in-shushi/ #CivilNet #ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉ #dailyarmenia

entry.title: 2021-ีซึ ีฐีฅีฟีธ ีฅึีฅึ ีฟีกึีซีถ ีกีถึีฅีฌ ีง ีซีทีญีกีถีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฐีฅีฟ ีคีซีดีกีฏีกีตีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีผีฅีชีซีดีธึีด. ิณีกึีฅีฃีซีถ ิฝีธึีดีกึีตีกีถ

media:group.media:title: 2021-ีซึ ีฐีฅีฟีธ ีฅึีฅึ ีฟีกึีซีถ ีกีถึีฅีฌ ีง ีซีทีญีกีถีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฐีฅีฟ ีคีซีดีกีฏีกีตีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีผีฅีชีซีดีธึีด. ิณีกึีฅีฃีซีถ ิฝีธึีดีกึีตีกีถ
media:group.media:description:
44-ึ ึีตีก ีบีกีฟีฅึีกีฆีดีซึ ีธึ ีฐีกีฟีฏีกีบีฅีฝ 2021-ีซึ ีฐีฅีฟีธ ีซีถีฑ ีกีผีกีปีกึีฏีพีฅีฌ ีง ีกีถีฅีฌ ีธึีธีทีกีฏีซ ีขีกีถีฅึ, ีธึีธีถึ ีถีธึีดีกีฌ ีดีกึีคีซีฏ ีฝีธีพีธึีกีขีกึ ีซึีกึ ีดีฅีป ีนีฅีถ ึีถีถีกึีฏีธึีด: ิฑีตีฝ ีดีกีฝีซีถ ีกีฝีธึีด ีง ีีกีถึีกีตีซีถ ีผีกีคีซีธีตีซ ีถีกีญีฏีซีถ ีฟีถึ ึีฅีถ, ีถีฅึีฏีกีตีธึีด ีฟีถึ ึีฅีถีซ ีฉีฅีฏีถีกีฎีธึ ิณีกึีฅีฃีซีถ ิฝีธึีดีกึีตีกีถีจ:
ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ิฑึีทีกีฌีธึีตีฝ ีีฒีคีฅีฝีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึีตึีธึีด ีถีก ีถีทีธึีด ีง, ีธึ ีกีผีกีปีกึีฏีถีฅึีจ ีพีฅึีกีขีฅึีฅีฌ ีฅีถ ีฏีกีผีกีพีกึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีกีทีญีกีฟีกีถึีจ, ีฝีกีฐีดีกีถีกีดีฅึีฑ ีฐีกีดีกีตีถึีถีฅึีซ ีญีถีคีซึีถีฅึีจ ีฌีธึีฝีกีขีกีถีฅีฌีธึ ีขีถีธึีตีฉีซีถ, ีถีกึี ึีธึีฑีกีฃีฅีฟีถีฅึีซึ ีธึีด ีฐึีกีพีซึีฅีฌ ีีกีถึีกีตีซีถ ีผีกีคีซีธ, ีธึีด` ีธีน, ึ ีซีถีนีบีฅีฝ ีบีฅีฟึ ีง ีีกีถึีกีตีซีถ ีผีกีคีซีธีตีซ ีกีทีญีกีฟีกีฏีซึีถีฅึีจ ีคึีฝึีธึีฅีถ ีซึีฅีถึ ีฝีธึีซีกีฌีกีฏีกีถ ึีกีถึีฅึีธึีด:

media:group.media:title: Inside Armenia's economic reforms
media:group.media:description:
In this episode of the CivilNet Podcast, host Patrick Elliott sits down with Hovsep Patvakanyan from the Investment Council of Armenia, to explore the country's ambitious economic reforms. Patvakanyan provides insider insights into the ongoing transformations in Armenia's manufacturing sector, the impact of recent tax reforms, and the driving forces behind the nation's construction boom. This conversation offers a comprehensive look at Armenia's economic landscape, highlighting the strategies and challenges in positioning the country for sustainable growth and increased foreign investment.

entry.title: Populists vs. Elites: The Battle for Western Civilization (and Armenia)

media:group.media:title: Populists vs. Elites: The Battle for Western Civilization (and Armenia)
media:group.media:description:
In this episode of CivilNet's podcast, Eric Hacopian delivers a no-holds-barred analysis of the global political landscape, dissecting the French elections, Iranian Presidential elections, European parliamentary shifts, and the looming US presidential race. He addresses the influence these events can have on Armenia and its nascent western reorientation.

media:group.media:title: Food and Flavors of Dilijan
media:group.media:description:
Varda Avetisyan is a successful restaurant owner in Dilijan, Armenia, although she did not always think that would be the case. In her youth, she had the opportunity to leave Armenia and study in Chicago. After graduation, she realized that sharing her food with the community was what would bring her the most fulfillment in life, and she moved back to Armenia. Watch Varda share her experience in Armeniaโs restaurant industry and talk about why she lets chasing her happiness drive her career.

Meta-ีถ ีฐีกีดีกีฃีธึีฎีกีฏึีธึีฉีตีธึีถ ีง ีฝีฏีฝีฅีฌ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ีฐีฅีฟี ีธึีบีฅีฝ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีธึีด ีฟีฅีฒีกีฏีกีถ ีกีผีกีปีซีถี ีฅึึีธึีค ีฏีธีฒีดีซ ึีกีฝีฟีฅึีซ ีฝีฟีธึีฃีดีกีถ ีฃีธึีฎีจีถีฏีฅึึ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซี ีีกีฝีฟีฅึีซ ีฝีฟีธึีฃีดีกีถ ีฝีฟีธึีกีขีกีชีกีถีดีกีถ ีฒีฅีฏีกีพีกึ ิฑีถีซ ิณึีซีฃีธึีตีกีถีจ ีทีฅีทีฟีธึีด ีงี ีฝีก ีนีซ ีฌีซีถีฅีฌีธึ ีบีกีตึีกึ ีฏีธีถีฏึีฅีฟ ีธึึีง ีกีถีฑีซ ีฏีกีด ีฌึีกีฟีพีกีดีซีปีธึีซ ีคีฅีด, ีกีตีฌ ีบีกีตึีกึี ีฐีกีถีธึีถ ีณีทีฃึีซีฟ ีฟีฅีฒีฅีฏีกีฟีพีธึีฉีตีกีถึ
